title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 189.2 - Aid to regional advisory and assistance agencies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 189.2 - Aid to regional advisory and assistance agencies

State Regulations

Allowable expenditures may include personnel costs, travel
costs, supplies and equipment, costs of necessary reproduction of material on
historical records techniques and procedures, and appropriate costs for office
space, telephones, and related overhead costs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
189.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
